about_the_game:
Do You Have What It Takes Kid?

Get ready to dive into MEMORYLEAK, an extraordinary FPS adventure like no other! Explore diverse dimensions in 2D, 3D, and VR, all set in a gripping, narrative-rich world of 2000s Texas. MEMORYLEAK isn’t just a game – it's a groundbreaking journey through time and reality, designed to captivate and thrill.

Why MEMORYLEAK is a Must-Play:

Embrace the future of gaming with MEMORYLEAK, where cutting-edge technology meets compelling storytelling. Developed with Unreal Engine 5, this game is a stunning visual feast with a heart-pounding storyline.

Varied Gameplay Dimensions: Jump between intense FPS battles, explore immersive VR worlds, and enjoy captivating 2D gameplay. MEMORYLEAK offers a gameplay experience for every style.

Engrossing Storyline: Set against the backdrop of Lampasas, Texas, MEMORYLEAK's narrative is inspired by real events, woven into an engaging and thought-provoking story.

Stunning Visuals: Experience the beauty of Unreal Engine 5, with breathtaking graphics, detailed environments, and a world that feels alive.

Interactive World: Every corner of MEMORYLEAK is crafted for maximum immersion and interactivity, making you feel truly part of the game.

Explore, Engage, Enjoy: With each dimension offering its unique challenges and delights, MEMORYLEAK promises endless hours of fun and exploration.

Key Highlights:

A unique blend of 2D, 3D, and VR gameplay.

A story that's as engaging as the gameplay itself.

Gorgeous graphics that push the limits of realism.

A living, breathing game world waiting for you to explore.

Sound and music that pull you deeper into the experience.

Ready for an adventure that will redefine how you think about gaming? MEMORYLEAK is waiting for you. Join us on this unforgettable journey, and let's push the boundaries of gaming together!

name: MEMORYLEAK™

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64) Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300 X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 64 GB available space
  • VR Support: Room-scale VR optimized,Compatible with Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, Valve Index
  • Additional Notes: *SUBJECT TO CHANGE*
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 Super or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 64 GB available space
  • VR Support: Room-scale VR optimized,Compatible with Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, Valve Index
  • Additional Notes: *SUBJECT TO CHANGE*

reviews:
“The video game is more or less based off of Operation Longhorn, not exactly a re-telling of it.”
Lampasas Dispatch Record
short_description: Immerse yourself in MEMORYLEAK, a unique FPS that blends 2D, 3D, and VR gameplay. Set in 2000s Texas with a gripping narrative, it offers stunning Unreal Engine 5 visuals and a dynamic, interactive world. Ready for an adventure that redefines gaming?
